column3: Conditions
Race 2 races in a row
Win 7 or more G1 races in Eastern Japan (Tokyo, Nakayama etc).
Win 7 or more G1 races in Western Japan (Kyoto, Hanshin etc).
Participate in races at 7 or more different racecourses.
Win at least one race in each distance category: Short, Mile, Medium, and Long.
Run 3 consecutive races; Reporter event needs to appear at least once in the run  '悦楽取材' (Pleasure Interview) event.
Finish a run with at least one purple skill.
Win a race with less than 1 bashin/horse length
Lose a race, then win any race.
Win a race with a C or lower aptitude for either ground or distance.

column1: パーフェクトクラウン (Perfect Crown)
column3: Win the Japanese Triple Crown (皐月賞, 日本ダービー, 菊花賞) plus a set of their respective trial races
column4: 弥生賞　（クラ3月前半）/ スプリングステークス　（クラ3月後半）/ 若葉ステークス　（クラ3月後半）
column5: 青葉賞　（クラ4月後半）/ プリンシパルステークス　（クラ5月前半）
column6: 神戸新聞杯　（クラ9月後半）/ セントライト記念　（クラ9月後半）

column1: パーフェクトティアラ (Perfect Tiara)
column3: Win the Japanese Fillies' Triple Crown (桜花賞, オークス, 秋華賞) plus a set of their respective trial races
column4: フィリーズレビュー　（クラ3月前半）/ チューリップステークス　（クラ3月前半）/ アネモネステークス　（クラ3月前半）
column5: フローラステークス　（クラ4月後半）/ スイートピーステークス　（クラ4月後半）
column6: ローズステークス　（クラ9月前半）/紫苑ステークス　（クラ9月前半）

column1: 一年の計は (Ichinen no Kei wa)
column3: Win either the 中山金杯 or 京都金杯 in the first turn of senior year.
Win 3 races from the Summer Sprint Series.
Win 3 races from the Summer Mile Series.
Win 3 races from the Summer 2000 Series.

column1: 星に願いを (Hoshi ni Negai wo)
column3: Win 3 races from the 'star/constellation' series.
Win 3 races from the 'jewel' series.
Win all four races with '新聞杯' in their name: 京都新聞杯, 神戸新聞杯, 中日新聞杯, and 東京新聞杯.

column1: 右/左の目覚め (Migi/Hidari no Mezame)
column3: Win at least 6 races with a specified turn direction.

column1: 春/夏/秋/冬の目覚め (Haru/Natsu/Aki/Fuyu no Mezame)
column3: Win at least 6 races in the specified season.
Obtain the skills 'しとやかな足取り' and '品行方正' simultaneously.
Obtain exactly 8 skills with '◯' in their names.
Obtain at least 3 skills related to downhill running.
Obtain at least 3 skills related to uphill running: '登山家', '勢い任せ', '十万バリキ', or '登竜門'.
Obtain at least 2 skills with '光' (light) or '電' (electricity) in their names.
Obtain at least 2 skills with '風' (wind) in their names.
Obtain the skills '晴れの日◯', '曇りの日◯', '雨の日◯', and '雪の日◯' simultaneously.
Obtain the skills '向こう見ず' and '後先恐れず' simultaneously.
Obtain at least 3 skills with 'プラン' (plan) in their names.
column4: トップランナー、プランX、レースプランナー

column3: Obtain at least 2 skills with '策' (strategy) in their names.

column1: ウマ娘よ大志を抱け (Uma Musume yo Taishi wo Idake)
column3: Obtain at least 3 skills with '志' (ambition) in their names.
Obtain at least 3 skills with '呼吸' (breathing) or '息' (breath) in their names.
Obtain at least 3 racecourse passive skills at level ◎.

column1: 想いの継ぎ手 (Omoi no Tsugite)
column3: Obtain at least 3 inherited unique skills.
Take at least 6 regular outings with the Uma Musume.
Trigger the hot spring event by winning the '温泉旅行券' lottery ticket.
Have all ground aptitudes (Turf/Dirt) at A, and win on both surfaces.
Have all distance aptitudes at A or higher.
Have all racing style aptitudes at A or higher.
Have at least 3 status stats reach exactly 777.

column1: スピードの目覚め (Speed no Mezame)
column3: Successfully complete Speed training at least 12 times.

column1: スタミナの目覚め (Stamina no Mezame)
column3: Successfully complete Stamina training at least 12 times.

column1: パワーの目覚め (Power no Mezame)
column3: Successfully complete Power training at least 12 times.

column1: 根性の目覚め (Guts no Mezame)
column3: Successfully complete Guts training at least 12 times.

column1: 賢さの目覚め (Intelligence no Mezame)
column3: Successfully complete Intelligence training at least 12 times.
